MR - LSTM.from sentence: In terms of s@1 score , MR - LSTM outperforms both KZH13 's results and TAG BL without even necessitating HP tuning .

large performance drop.from sentence: From we observe : ( 1 ) with HPs tuned on ARRAU - AA , we obtain results well beyond KZH13 , ( 2 ) all ablated model variants perform worse than the full model , ( 3 ) a large performance drop when omitting syntactic information ( tag , cut ) suggests that the model makes good use of it .

68.10 s@1 score.from sentence: Performance of 68.10 s@1 score indicates that the model is able to learn without syntactic guidance , contrary to the 19.68 s@1 score before tuning .

more successful.from sentence:
Results on the ARRAU corpus
The MR - LSTM is more successful in resolving nominal than pronominal anaphors , although the training data provides only pronominal ones .

shell noun resolution.from sentence: Moreover , for shell noun resolution in KZH13 's dataset , the MR - LSTM achieved s@1 scores in the range 76.09-93.14 , while the best variant of the model achieves 51.89 s@1 score for nominal anaphors in ARRAU - AA .

MR - LSTM without context embedding ( ct.from sentence: This is what we can observe from row 2 vs. row 6 in Table 5 : the MR - LSTM without context embedding ( ctx ) achieves a comparable s@ 2 score with the variant that omits syntactic information , but better s@3 - 4 scores .
